Text: Amazing upload! Could you please reseed it?

Great album! Normally I dislike chatting in between tracks on music CDs but in this case its both amusing and provides a great historical context. 

If you like this, you might enjoy the British folk singers Ewan Maccoll and Roy Bailey.
